isis.stitle: TEST EQUIPMENT AND CONNECTOR REPAIR - SPECIAL TOOLS - PACKARD HAND CRIMPERS

svcproc.title: PACKARD HAND CRIMPERS
svcproc.para: The following hand crimpers are available from Packard ( Figure 97 and Figure 98).

step1.para: 12085271 - Will crimp most stamped terminals from 10 gauge to 22 gauge terminals.
12085270 - Will crimp the cable seal wings on Packard Metri-Pack and Weather Pack terminals.
12085115 - Will crimp thicker stocked 1/4" blade terminals and also double crimp terminals.

svcproc.para: 1. COMPRESS HANDLES UNTIL RATCHET AUTOMATICALLY OPENS.
2. CORE WINGS SHOULD BE CRIMPED FIRST. LAY THE BACK OF THE TERMINAL CORE WINGS ON APPROPRIATE ANVIL. BE SURE THE CORE WINGS ARE POINTING TOWARD THE FORMING JAWS.
3. GENTLY APPLY PRESSURE TO HANDLES UNTIL CRIMPERS SLIGHTLY SECURE THE TERMINAL CORE WINGS.
4. INSERT STRIPPED CABLE THROUGH CORE CRIMP WINGS OF TERMINAL AND POSITION PROPERLY.
5. COMPRESS THE HANDLES UNTIL RATCHET AUTOMATICALLY RELEASES.
6. REPEAT STEPS 2 AND 3 FOR INSULATION CRIMP.
7. INSPECT TERMINAL CLOSELY FOR DAMAGE BEFORE APPLYING SOLDER.
